Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive build : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := build_one : forall t : btree A, build (t :: nil) t | build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t Arguments build _%list_scope Arguments build_step _ (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t
build_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
build_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
build_comp : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), build l1 t1 -> build l2 t2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2 -> same_sum_leaves f l1 l2 -> weight_tree f t1 = weight_tree f t2
build_cover : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), build l t -> cover l t
build_same_weight_tree : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), build l t1 -> build l t2 -> weight_tree f t1 = weight_tree f t2
cover_ordered_cover : forall (A : Type) (l1 : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l1 t -> exists l2 : list (btree A), permutation l1 l2 /\ ordered_cover l2 t
cover_permutation : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
ulist_ordered_cover : forall (A : Type) (l1 : list (btree A)) (l2 : list A) (t : btree A), ordered_cover l1 t -> ulist l2 -> l1 = map (fun x : A => leaf x) l2 -> all_leaves t = l2
cover_min_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover_min A f l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover_min A f l2 t
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
build_one : forall t : btree A, build (t :: nil) t
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
ulist_perm : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> ulist l1 -> ulist l2
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
cover_node : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
ordered_sum_leaves_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> ordered (sum_order f) l1 -> ordered (sum_order f) l2 -> map (sum_leaves f) l1 = map (sum_leaves f) l2
height_pred_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
Inductive ordered_cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := ordered_cover_one : forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> ordered_cover (t :: nil) t | ordered_cover_node : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> ordered_cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments ordered_cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cover_one _%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cover_node _%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _)%list_scope
all_permutations_aux_permutation : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n)
all_cover_cover : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), In t (all_cover A l) -> cover l t

```intros l1 l2 t H1 H2. induction H1.
- apply cover_one.
- apply cover_node with (l1' := l1') (l2' := l2').
  + apply permutation_trans with (l2 := l0); assumption.
  + apply IHH1; assumption.```
